nodes.excerpt: Placement is Everyone's Talent Agent. We help people get jobs through modern technology plus human support. Fly through your job search at Placement.com.

nodes.excerpt: Podpage makes it easy to create a podcast website with just a few clicks. Every page is optimized to be found on Google and stays up-to-date forever. No technical knowledge necessary.
nodes.title: Podpage - Build a podcast website in less than 5 minutes.
nodes.author: Brenden Mulligan

localize.description: Podpage使得只需点击几下即可轻松创建播客网站。每个页面都经过优化，可以在Google上找到，并且永远保持最新。不需要技术知识。

nodes.excerpt: 🖤 Blanc is the one and only full-face mask to protect your eyes, nose and mouth from the outside world, make sure you breathe fresh and clean air thanks to its 2 high-efficiency HEPA filters. Keep your identity safe and fit your outfit.
nodes.title: Blanc Mask - Your full-face modular mask with HEPA filters
nodes.author: Norayr Margarian

localize.description: 🖤Blanc是唯一一款也是唯一一款保护您的眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴免受外界影响的全脸面膜，它的2个高效过滤器确保您呼吸到清新干净的空气。保护好你的身份，穿上合适的衣服。
localize.tagline: 您的带有高效空气过滤器的全脸模块化面罩

localize.description: 🖤Blanc是唯一一款也是唯一一款保護您的眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴免受外界影響的全臉面膜，它的2個高效過濾器確保您呼吸到清新幹淨的空氣。保護好你的身份，穿上合適的衣服。

nodes.excerpt: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.

nodes.excerpt: Jumpr is the world’s first AR jump rope! Simply place your iPhone upright on the floor, Jumpr uses AI-powered body tracking to detect your movement and give you a virtual jump rope on the screen to begin skipping away!
nodes.title: Jumpr - Virtual jump rope APP
nodes.author: David Liu

localize.description: Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳绳！只需将你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驱动的身体跟踪来检测你的移动，并在屏幕上给你一个虚拟的跳绳，开始跳走！
localize.tagline: 虚拟跳绳APP

localize.description: Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳繩！只需將你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驅動的身體跟蹤來檢測你的移動，並在屏幕上給你一個虛擬的跳繩，開始跳走！
localize.tagline: 虛擬跳繩APP

nodes.excerpt: Imagine selling off all those annual subscriptions you don't use anymore and can't refund. We help you do exactly that. In a nutshell - unloved is a platform for buying and selling pre-owned tech subscriptions.

nodes.excerpt: We made deepfake save simple and legal for you 🙂. So now you can have fun with this technology. Try more than 30 templates with 12 voices. Send to a friend a parody Merry Christmas greeting from celebrities 🤣🎉
nodes.title: Deepfake Christmas Сongratulations - Send your loved ones a funny and unique video congratulation
nodes.author: Vlad Sveshnikov

localize.description: 我们为你做了简单而合法的深度假拯救，🙂。所以现在你可以享受这项技术的乐趣了。尝试使用12种声音的30多个模板。向朋友发送名人🤣🎉的恶搞圣诞祝福
localize.tagline: 向你所爱的人发送一段有趣而独特的祝贺视频

nodes.excerpt: InCharge X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed. Available in a 5 foot long version, too!
nodes.title: InCharge X - The 100W Swiss Army knife of cables
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1钥匙扣电缆。多亏了它的6种充电组合，你几乎可以在超高速下给任何设备充电。也有5英尺长的版本可供选择！
localize.tagline: 100W的瑞士军刀电缆

localize.description: InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1鑰匙扣電纜。多虧了它的6種充電組合，你幾乎可以在超高速下給任何設備充電。也有5英尺長的版本可供選擇！
localize.tagline: 100W的瑞士軍刀電纜

localize.tagline: 适用于小型办公室的深色和浅色、可打印的日历

nodes.excerpt: The SketchAR Mask Editor lets our users make custom AR lenses on Snapchat in minutes. Tap “Create AR Mask” on SketchAR. You can fill in a special template expressively or step by step. Then, tap “Try Lens”. Finally, transfer the mask to Snapchat.
nodes.title: SketchAR Masks for Snapchat - Create your own AR Mask for Snapchat in minutes
nodes.author: Andrey Drobitko

localize.description: SketchAR Mask Editor让我们的用户在几分钟内就可以在Snapchat上制作定制的AR镜头。点击SketchAR上的“Create AR Mask”(创建AR蒙版)。特殊模板可以表现式填写，也可以分步填写。然后，点击“试用镜头”。最后，将面具转移到Snapchat。
localize.tagline: 几分钟内即可为Snapchat创建您自己的AR掩码

localize.description: SketchAR Mask Editor讓我們的用戶在幾分鐘內就可以在Snapchat上製作定製的AR鏡頭。點擊SketchAR上的“Create AR Mask”(創建AR蒙版)。特殊模板可以表現式填寫，也可以分步填寫。然後，點擊“試用鏡頭”。最後，將面具轉移到Snapchat。
localize.tagline: 幾分鐘內即可爲Snapchat創建您自己的AR掩碼

nodes.excerpt: Connect with your loved ones and create lasting memories, with video messages from Canva. There’s always an occasion to celebrate, create customized video messages by yourself or with a group and make every moment special.
nodes.title: Video Messages from Canva - Celebrate any occasion with a group video message.
nodes.author: Lachlan Andrews

localize.description: 通过Canva提供的视频信息，与您所爱的人保持联系，创造永恒的回忆。总会有庆祝的机会，自己或和团队一起制作定制的视频信息，让每一个时刻都变得特别。
localize.tagline: 用一条集体视频信息来庆祝任何场合。

localize.description: 通過Canva提供的視頻信息，與您所愛的人保持聯繫，創造永恆的回憶。總會有慶祝的機會，自己或和團隊一起製作定製的視頻信息，讓每一個時刻都變得特別。
localize.tagline: 用一條集體視頻信息來慶祝任何場合。

nodes.excerpt: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourself—it's a whole new way to chat.
nodes.title: Honk - Real-time messaging
nodes.author: Alberto Antoniazzi

localize.description: 喇叭是一种与朋友实时聊天的新方式，当你打字时，消息会实时显示！快，有趣，私密。畅所欲言，做你自己--这是一种全新的聊天方式。
localize.tagline: 实时消息传送

nodes.excerpt: Fastival is an intermittent fasting app which supports you to take breaks from eating to feel healthier and lose weight. Intermittent fasting boosts your immune system by giving your body time to digest food better and in turn strengthen the body’s defenses.
nodes.title: Fastival - Discover the power of intermittent fasting
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: Fastival是一个间歇性的禁食应用程序，它支持你从进食中抽出时间来感觉更健康和减肥。间歇性禁食让你的身体有时间更好地消化食物，进而增强身体的防御能力，从而增强你的免疫系统。
localize.tagline: 发现间歇性禁食的力量

localize.description: Fastival是一個間歇性的禁食應用程序，它支持你從進食中抽出時間來感覺更健康和減肥。間歇性禁食讓你的身體有時間更好地消化食物，進而增強身體的防禦能力，從而增強你的免疫系統。
localize.tagline: 發現間歇性禁食的力量

nodes.excerpt: Hey you! Yes, you! You're part of the Product Hunt community! Whether you are making those great products, hunting the amazing ones, upvoting the ones you especially love, or just dicussing them - see how you impacted PH this year with ProductHunt Wrapped!
nodes.title: ProductHunt Wrapped - Maker or Hunter see how you added to the PH community!
nodes.author: Tim Carambat

localize.description: 嘿，你！是的，就是你！您是产品猎头社区的一员！无论你是在制作那些伟大的产品，寻找令人惊叹的产品，还是提升你特别喜欢的产品，还是只是在讨论它们-看看你今年在ProductHunt的包装下对PH产生了怎样的影响！
localize.tagline: 制造者或猎人，看看你是如何加入PH社区的！

localize.description: 嘿，你！是的，就是你！您是產品獵頭社區的一員！無論你是在製作那些偉大的產品，尋找令人驚歎的產品，還是提升你特別喜歡的產品，還是隻是在討論它們-看看你今年在ProductHunt的包裝下對PH產生了怎樣的影響！
localize.tagline: 製造者或獵人，看看你是如何加入PH社區的！

nodes.excerpt: Hello, would you like to book a call with technology experts? Hacker Noon started a marketplace for on demand video calls with experts in programming, cryptocurrency, ux, remote work, outer space, startups, and futurism.

nodes.excerpt: - Disk Space Fan is a super-fast + easy to use disk space analyzer - DSF's utilises Master File Table (MFT) tech to deliver the fastest disk scan speeds - Other features incl smart space usage visualizations + powerful tools to identify big/duplicate files

nodes.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
nodes.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes

localize.description: 停止花费大量时间在多个部门(包括IT、商业、人力资源、法律、医疗、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文档。使用Fastdok生成即用型文档，只需回答几个问题，即可在几分钟内完成工作。
